readability_reflection: I personally like the string interpolation as it leaves it clearer to me personally what is a variable type and what is not
comprehension_debugging: Yes many times I was confused whether or not something was an actual string or an interpolation, such when there was strings "[insert word here]" combined with random numbers that didn't have brackets
preference_rationale: I would choose string interpolation as it is clearer to understand what is part of the string and what is variable like
learning_curve: This is actually the first time that I had played with string interpolation and it was an interesting to see what it can do. Concatenation on the other hand I have played with before but not when mixing both strings and random numbers
suggestions_improvement: Perhaps if I had some more documentation prior to doing the tests it would be easier to understand
